summary: This is a forwarded email from August 13, 2019, warning that The New York Times may imminently report that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records related to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration or death.

events.title: Email Warning of Impending Times Report
events.description: An email is forwarded warning that The New York Times may report as early as that night that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 13, 2019.
It warns of an imminent New York Times report regarding falsified records at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The falsified records are implied to be related to the Jeffrey Epstein case, given the subject line and context.
The email was sent from an iPhone, indicating mobile communication.
